text:
alias youtube-audio='youtube-dl -i --audio-format best -x'
alias youtube-video='youtube-dl -i --format bestvideo+bestaudio[ext=m4a]/bestvideo+bestaudio/best'
alias ffmpeg2webMp4='for i in *.{mp4,mkv,webm,avi}; do sudo ffmpeg -i "$i" -vcodec h264 -acodec aac -strict -2 -pix_fmt yuv420p -vf "scale=trunc(iw/2)*2:trunc(ih/2)*2" "output/${i%.*}.mp4"; done'
